trans-unit.source: We may define discoursal point of view as the relationship, expressed through discourse structure, between the implied author or some other addresser, and the fiction .
trans-unit.note: Terms: discoursal point of view [the relationship, expressed through discourse structure, between the implied author or some other addresser, and the fiction];

trans-unit.source: We may define refulgence as a radiant or resplendent quality or state
trans-unit.note: Terms: refulgence [a radiant or resplendent quality or state];

trans-unit.source: But I'm not sure how quincunx can be defined.
